Online participation:Live Broadcasting Enquire About Attending, Sponsoring, Fees , Please Contact: marketing@ecvinternational.com For More Information, Please Visit: Rethink Circularity: European Circular Economy Summit 2024 Date: December 5-6, 2024 Place: Frankfurt, Germany Organizer: ECV International Official Website: https://www.ecv-events.com/EuropeanCircularEconomy/index.php?cci=17 Background In the era of net-zero and digitalization, it is necessary to rethink the circular economy. Defined by the European Commission as "where the value of products, materials and resources is maintained in the economy for as long as possible, and the generation of waste is minimized," the circular economy aims to decouple economic growth from resource consumption. To achieve more sustainable development models and meet the 2050 Net-zero target, the EU launched a new Circular Economy Action Plan in 2020. The benefits of the circular economy extend beyond achieving climate goals and reducing resource consumption, it also enhances business profitability, creates new commercial opportunities, and improves supply chain resilience. The development of digital technologies provides essential support for achieving cradle-to-cradle cycles in the circular economy. Transforming the European economy into one that is cleaner and more competitive requires collaborative efforts across industries. This transformation must involve comprehensive and systematic changes, integrating ecological principles into design stages to minimize resource consumption and waste generation. It necessitates coordinated cooperation throughout the entire value chain. The summit aims to facilitate communication and learning among different industries and stakeholders in key areas crucial for advancing the circular economy. Participants will share new insights into achieving circular economy goals, strategies, and proven effective actions. It also serves as a high-quality platform for participants across the value chain to strengthen cooperation, exchange ideas, and explore new business opportunities. We Will Unite Thought Leaders, Policymakers And Innovators From Leading Global Companies To Discuss Hot Topics : Action on New Circular Economy Perspective from European Policies and Regulations. Unlock the Value of Circularity by Establishing Circular Business Models to Drive Economic Growth and Environmental Benefit. How to Deploy Strategies and Take Actions to Realize Automotive Industrys Circularity Transition. A Holistic Approach to Decouple Growth from Finite Resource Consumption across the Entire Value Chain. Redefine Products How Design Driving the Future of Circularity. Circular Packaging - Reduce Resource Consumption from the Design Stage and Improve the Safety and Recyclability of Materials. Panel Discussion: Challenges and Methods to Realize European Circular Economy Transition. Establish a Management System to Guide the Road towards Circular Economy and Waste Management. Navigating a Path to Leverage Circular Potential of Steel Industry. Extracting and Recycling Rare Earth Permanent Magnets to Promote more Resilient Supply Chain. From Linear to Circular Embracing the Future of Circular Economy Transition. Developing Battery Closed Loop Recycling to Decrease EV Carbon Emissions throughout the Life Cycle. Innovation-Driven New Technologies and Products to Boost the Recycling of Plastic Materials. The Fashion Remodel Future Production and Consumption to be more Sustainable. Digital Innovation: Data based Life Circle Assessment Foster the Transition to Circular Economy. ...... 947326788927.summary: Hallo, 2025 findet wieder der #NOSSUED Software Entwicklungs Open Space in der "Wieder komplett vor Ort" Edition statt, der sich rund um alle Aspekte der Software Entwicklung dreht und bei dem Du dich mit anderen im Rahmen eines Open Spaces austauschen kannst. - Denn in den letzten 16 erfolgreichen #NOSSUED Open Spaces hat sich gezeigt, dass das Open Space Format ideal fr einen informellen Austausch geeignet ist und die besten Gesprche immer noch fernab von einer festgelegten Agenda stattfinden. Bei einem Kaffee, einen Keks in der Hand und beim "Du" fhrt man die besten Gesprche. Dort gibt es keine Rollenaufteilung in Sprecher:in / Zuhrer:in und die Themen finden sich ganz von selbst vor Ort oder Du bringst einfach welche mit, die Dir eventuell aktuell oder schon lange auf den Ngeln rund um Software Entwicklung, Software Architektur, Software Testing, Scrum, Projekt Managment, Requirements, IoT, Microservices, Patterns, Clean Code, TDD, BDD, JavaScript, .NET, Java, C, C++, Python, R, PHP, F#, TypeScript, Angular, React, Azure, AWS, Embedded, BigData, SQL, NoSql, Ci, CD ..... brennen. Auch wenn Du mal was Cooles vorstellen willst. Alles kein Problem. - Das ist die Idee vom #NOSSUED in Karlsruhe - Alle sind gleich! Auch die Organisatoren halten sich im Hintergrund und moderieren nur wenig. Der Teilnahme-Beitrag am #NOSSUED in Karlsruhe 2025 ist prinzipiell frei whlbar! Die Veranstaltung finanziert sich jedoch vornehmlich ber die Beitrge der Teilnehmer:innen. Ob 20, 30 , 50 , 100 oder mehr, entscheidest du vollkommen frei und selbst (Wegen Eventbrite muss es aber mindestens 1 Cent sein, da sonst die Anmeldung nicht funktioniert :o( ). Dein gespendeter Betrag fr das Ticket beinhaltet 19% Mehrwertsteuer! Du Bekommst mit der Anmeldung eine Rechnung inklusive Mehrwertsteuer. Die Eventbrite-Gebhren bernehmen wir. Dein Sponsoring wird fr das Catering und ein wenig Drumherum verwendet. Erlebe die "Unkonferenz" und ein super Wochenende in Karlsruhe. Wir freuen uns auf Dich!

919849714257.summary: Backgrou n d With the Green Deal, European Union's ambitious goal is to reduce net greenhouse gas emissions by a substantial 55% by 2030 and 90-95% by 2040,relative to 1990 levels, to become the world's first climate-neutral continent by2050. As a lightweight metal with recyclable characteristics, aluminum is considered green that benefits European sectors to reduce carbon emissions and has the potential to play a pivotal role in Europe's transition towards agreener future. However, lots of work still needed to be done in legislation and policymaking, low carbon energy transition, technology development,sustainable value chain, etc. The 2nd European Green Aluminium Summit 2024 will take aluminium carbon reduction as the theme, unites key stakeholders from aluminium industry, policy regulators, major industry suppliers and technology providers to address hot topics such as green aluminium trend, net zero roadmap, energy transition,green technology development, aluminium recycling, decarbonization solutions,etc. aiming to gather best practices/insights in aluminium industry towards net zero. Event Date/ Location / Organizer November 20-21,2024 / Frankfurt,Germany / ECV International The summit will be held in-person and online. Highlights l 2024 European Green Aluminium Trend l Decarbonization Roadmap for Global Aluminium Industry to Zero-carbon World l Promise to Net Zero Emission: Technologies to Accelerate Aluminium Decarbonization l Address Emissions across the Value Chain to Reduce Carbon Footprint l Sustainable Aluminum Finance Framework Supporting the Decarbonization of Aluminium Production l Scaling Circularity of Aluminium Industry to Achieve Sustainability Goals l Decarbonizing Automotive Industry with Closed-loop Recycling Process l Achieving Sustainable Packaging Strategy with Recyclable Aluminium l Sustainability Data Facilitating the Production and Sourcing of Greener Aluminium l How Surface Works in Green and High-quality Aluminium Production l Panel Discussion: Aluminium: A Critical Material in Europes Green Energy Transition l Panel Discussion: How can Carbon Capture Technology Promote Aluminum Industry a Greener Future l Panel Discussion: How to Substantially Expand Aluminium Recycling Capacity and Increase Recycling Rate in Europe l Panel Discussion: How would CBAM Affect Aluminum Industry in EU Market l ...... Industry Sectors Consulting; Association; Primary aluminium; Recycled aluminium; Aluminium aloys; Automotive industry; Packaging industry; Construction industry; Photovoltaic industry; Auto Component; Energy; Metal Exchange; Raw/Recycled aluminium processing solution; Smelting/Heat processing solution; Sorting and separation solution; Decarbonization process solution The 2nd European Green Aluminium Summit 2024 is looking forward to your arrival. To learn about summit registration, sponsorship and partnership information, please contact: https://www.ecv-events.com/ads/EuropeanGreenAluminum/index.php Email: marketing@ecvinternational.com About us ECV International is a leading organizer of high-end international events of all sizes with 100+ experts on industry research, event planning and management. We are committed to providing customers with high-quality and personalized service for each and every event. Our business scope reaches out the globe. Every year, we host regularly more than 60 high-level online and in-person international conferences in Singapore, Vietnam, China, Thailand, United Arab Emirates, France, Germany and other countries, attracting 6,000+ attendees from across the world including senior management of established players, to first-time entrepreneurs of start-ups, to technical KOLs. Our mission is to present the cutting-edge and high-quality content, build a valuable networking platform for corporate executives, and help decision makers create value and pursue excellence.

1044836593377.summary: Do you feel frustrated and disappointed with dating apps ? You are not alone! According to research, the majority of single men and women say dating on apps has left them more frustrated than hopeful. When dating on apps leaves you feeling frustrated and disappointed, it is not sustainable. You will either want to give up and quit dating prematurely or your feeling of frustration will drain your energy, and your matches and dates will feel that vibe. Endless swiping, not getting quality matches, conversations that fizzle out, fake profiles, disappointing dates, wasting lots of time and energy, and no results? It is time to learn how to be successful on dating apps! . My name is Trea Tijmens. I am an award-winning dating expert, love coach, international matchmaker, and the founder of Success Match. For the past 19 years, I have been helping successful single professionals find love. Thanks to my no-nonsense, science-based approach 85% of my clients find the right partner. I have successfully guided many of my clients through the jungle on dating apps to success. You too, can learn how to be successful on dating apps! Whether you have dated or are dating on apps with little success so far or have never dated on an app before, the "5 Reasons You are Unsuccessful on Dating Apps" workshop is for you! After this fun, live, interactive workshop, you will: Understand why you're not successful in dating on apps Identify what you can work on and change your approach to partner search Get strategic about dating on apps and finally find that great partner Book your seat at our live workshop for singles, "5 Reasons You're Unsuccessful on Dating Apps" This event is open to single ladies and gentlemen Tuesday, 26 November from 6:30 till 10 pm What to expect? 18:30 pm Arrival, registration and welcome drink 19:00 21:00 Welcome and short round of introductions. Workshop 5 Reasons you are unsuccessful on dating apps 21:00 22:00 Singles Networking Drink Space is limited. Secure your ticket today. Limited seating! Early bird rate: 150 CHF*. Prices go up after 23 October. *The fee includes a welcome drink and a singles networking drink at the end. By completing the ticket purchase, you agree to the Terms and Conditions

1044836593377.title: Live Singles Event - 5 Reasons You are Unsuccessful on Dating Apps

142367716673.summary: The ethereal Tour du Mont Blanc follows the most popular and breathtakingly beautiful alpine trails of Europe. Feast your eyes on the stunning vistas of snow-capped mountain peaks and hike along the picturesque passes that boast of lush greenery, to catch glimpses of Chamonix and marmots along the walking or hiking trails. Make memories that last a lifetime at the dreamy trails of Switzerland, France, and Italy. Indulge in the pristine beauty of nature and fall in love with the alpine scenery. Relish the delectable flavors of Swiss cheese, chocolates, and continental cuisine during the vacation, and dont forget to take photos of the alpine meadows, tumbling glaciers, charming hamlets, and endless oceans of lush greenery and colorful flowers. Highlights Visited Places: Geneva Chamonix valley Le Tour Trient Champex Courmayeur Les Chapieux Les Contamines Les Houches Travel Experience: Savor the flavor of Swiss chocolate and cheese European culture and traditions Riding the cable car between alpine mountain peaks Crossing the colossal fields of glacier Hiking Walking Shopping at small towns while on hike 3 different country experience Swiss, France, Italy 6 Reasons To Book This Trip 1. Affordable Adventure Traveling with a like-minded group is not only fun but also its cost-effective instead of traveling solo. 2. Forget About The Planning We take care of permits, transportation, and logistics, so all you have to do is show up. 3. Shared Photos At the end of every trip we will have a google photo album where we share our wonderful tour pictures. We can also share to this website and multiply the memories! 4. Make New Friends On every trip you will meet new people, its a good opportunity to make friends for your life while enjoying the group event. 5. Group Leader Event organizer will be there every step of the way, making sure that the trip goes as smoothly as possible. 6. Unforgettable Memories All events are designed keeping in mind to have an unforgettable memory of your lifetime. Notes Tour Start : GENEVA Tour End : GENEVA Destination SWITZERLAND Flights Arrival: Day01 before 2pm (Flexible) Return: Day09 anytime after 8am (Flexible) Airport: Geneva Intl. airport (Switzerland) Meeting Point The group meets at the arrival airport or at the hotel on Day01. More details will be provided via group chat on WhatsApp Itinerary Day01: GENEVA Description: The blissful and romantic tour of Mont Blanc begins with the arrival at Geneva. Meet and greet the group members after checking into the hotel. Today is a free day to explore on your own, our tour leader will accompany you though. Explore the top tourist attractions of Geneva. Marvel at the beautiful Jet dEau fountain, and then check out the monumental wooden sculpture, the Broken Chair. Proceed to take tours of Old Town Geneva, Lake Geneva, Cathedral, and Palace of Nations in Geneva. Sample the delicious Swiss chocolate and Swiss cheese at the local restaurants too. Spend the night at the hotel in Geneva. Activities Included: N/A Free time Accommodation: Hotel in Geneva Day02 : CHAMONIX VALLEY Description: Board the shuttle cab after breakfast to reach Chamonix in Mont Blanc, the beautiful resort at the junction of Switzerland, Italy, and France. Chamonix valley is at the base of Mont Blanc, the highest summit in the Alps, its renowned for its skiing. Free time to explore the little town, consider taking a ride in the scenic cable car in the Alpine peaks with breathtaking views of the Aiguille du Midi, glacial fields at the Italian Border, and Pointe Helbronner. You will find all hiking gears in town if you missed out on any gear. Activities Included: N/A Free time Shuttle to Chamonix Meals Included: Breakfast Accommodation: Hotel in Chamonix Day03 (MONT BLANC: LE TOUR TRIENT) Description: Today the hiking adventure begins from the village of Le Tour. You will meet the local hiking guide and embark on the 6-day marvelous hike. Follow the picturesque mountainous path of Balme after departing from Le Tour Village to reach Switzerland. Fill your memory card with photos of Mont Blanc, Needles of Chamonix, the Drus, and la Verte during the tour. Cross the Switzerland and France border to reach the Trient village. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Dinner Accommodation: Hotel /gite hostel Day04 : TRIENT CHAMPEX Description: You can follow either of the two routes from Trient to Champex. The first route is along the Mountain Of Bovine, which requires you to cross the Farclaz Pass of marvelous views of the lake. You can take the Fenetre dArpette route, which resembles Tour du Mont Blanc and is challenging too. Marvel at the Rhone Valley of the Balconies above the Martigny. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Dinner Accommodation: Hotel /gite hostel Day05 : CHAMPEX COURMAYEUR Description: Take the bus ride to Fouly and then climb to the summit Vol Ferret through the quaint villages of Clou, Ferret, and Granges. Admire the lush green pastures of the Peulaz Mountain and then climb again in the picturesque Ferret Pass to the head of the Dolent and Ferret Border. Drink in the breathtaking views of the mountain meadows and the glaciers of Triolet and Bar pastures during the descent. Spend the night at the bustling village of Courmayeur. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Dinner Accommodation: Hotel /gite hostel Day06 : COURMAYEUR LES CHAPIEUX Description: Catch the bus to Val Veni and then take a long and idyllic walk along the ancient fortifications of Alpini and the magnificent limestone pyramids to get to Col de Seigne. Marvel at the glittering Aiguille des Glaciers and take a stroll in the mountain pastures of Le Beaufort. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Dinner Accommodation: Hotel /gite hostel Day07 : LES CHAPIEUX LES CONTAMINES Description: This morning will find you feasting your eyes on the picturesque peaks of Vanoise from atop the Col de la Croix du Bonhomme. Continue down the trail to Col du Bonhomme until you cross the Contamines Natural Reserve. Descend along the gorge of pine forests to reach the Notre Dame de la Gorge church at the old Roman Road. Stop at the area of the marmots before continuing with the walk. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Dinner Accommodation: Hotels /gite hostel Day08 : LES CONTAMINES LES HOUCHES Description: Follow the trail along the picturesque river valley to reach La Gruvas and making the way to Le Champel before braving the steep hike up along the Bionnassay to Col de Vaza. You can also take the longer route that requires hiking at Col du Tricot, at 2120m above sea level. Soak in the panoramic views of the pistes and limestone cliffs from atop the Col du Tricot. Descend along the tracks and gravel roads to get to Les Houches, where the hike finally ends. Drive back to Geneva in the evening. There are no activities planned in Geneva, so you can either stay at the hotel or explore the nightlight in Geneva. Activities Included: Mont Blanc hiking Shuttle to Geneva Meals Included: Breakfast Lunch (Picnic Style) Accommodation: Hotel in Geneva Day09 : GENEVA Description: Its time to say goodbye to your fellow travelers as the tour ends today with a breakfast at the hotel. Check out is usually by 11am so book your return flight accordingly. Hoping that you have captured the best moments on camera and packed in a host of travel memories to carry back home with you. Payment Instructions : 1. You should login from a PC to see the 'Pay Now' button, after RSVPing. Then hit the button. 2. Verify correct dollar amount for number of people you're paying for. 3. If you don't have a Paypal account, click "Pay with a Debit or Credit Card". 4. If you have a Paypal account, simply log in, and pay as you normally would via Paypal. Refund and Ticket Resell Policy All sales are final. We only refund the full amount, if the event is canceled. If it is rescheduled, we will send an email to ticket holders advising that. A full refund will be given to those that let us know within 2 calendar days of the update email, if you are unable to make it on the new date. No refunds will be given after that time. However, you can sell your ticket to someone else if you are unable to attend. Please, feel free to post in the comment box for the event, that you have a ticket for sale. Work out payment between yourselves, and have the seller only send the organizer a message letting us know the full name of the person taking your spot. You must let us know two hours before the RSVP close time, on the day of the event.

142367716673.title: Mont Blanc (Switzerland, France and Italy) Trip

1003587546367.summary: Leading experts from institutions around the world will share their latest studies and insights. 1014423366597.summary: UNEP FI is hosting its 18th Global Roundtable on 10-11 December in Geneva, Switzerland and online. The flagship event will focus on accelerating practical approaches to setting and implementing targets in areas including net zero, nature, impact, pollution, human rights, and financial inclusion to help achieve the Sustainable Development Goals. UNEP FIs biennial Global Roundtable (GRT) is a key event for driving action within the finance industry, offering thousands of professionals the chance to collaborate with peers and gain insights from global leaders. The GRT convenes a diverse group of stakeholders, including banks, insurers, investors, regulators, policymakers, and civil society, to collectively shape the sustainable finance agenda and catalyse action across the financial system to deliver more sustainable global economies for years to come. This year, the Global Roundtable will be held under the same roof as Building Bridges (9-12 December), a powerful movement that brings 2500+ attendees from 100+ countries from the finance and corporate sectors, governments, civil society, academia, and sustainable development communities to Geneva annually, to shape the global sustainable finance agenda and build a bridge towards a global economic model that meets the needs of a sustainable and just society. Find out more about this collaborative effort here. Click here to view the agenda and confirmed speakers. For questions or comments, contact us at roundtable@unepfi.org Are you a UNEP FI member? Please visit the UNEP FI Member's Area to receive your free ticket. Did you know? Your ticket also grants you access to the Building Bridges Action Days (10-12 December 2024)!
1014423366597.description: UNEP FI is hosting its 18th Global Roundtable on Sustainable Finance on 10-11 December in Geneva, Switzerland and online.
1014423366597.venue_name: Geneva International Conference Center (CICG) and online
1014423366597.title: UNEP FI Global Roundtable 2024
